name: Initiis meum
description:
Dark hack and slash RPG made as my first large PC project.

The story is set in medieval times. The player is thrown into desperate times. Monsters and death overran every kingdom on the planet. You are on a quest to deliver a very important message to Brith castle.

  • Interesting combat
  • Great dark atmosphere
  • Deep soundtrack
  • Visually pleasing VFX
  • An environment with a background story
  • Branching and dynamic dialogs
  • Full inventory system
  • Complex abilities system with customization and leveling

After 6 months of development, I am releasing 30 minutes long game, in which you can experience the feeling of playing classic games like Diablo. I have learned so much from this project. I will never regret even one second spend developing this game.

I will be very pleased if you would try out my game, it´s only 30 minutes, and give me feedback on vykopaldavid@gmail.com.
